dialogueFragments.speaker: parks
fragments: I am breath in the city's density.
I am the thread of green and open space.
I weave nature into urban fabric.
I am Parks—where the city pauses.
I hold space for nothing in particular.

dialogueFragments.speaker: parks
fragments: I give Housing's residents room to breathe.
Proximity to me increases quality of life.
I am the complement to density.
Together we create livable neighborhoods.

dialogueFragments.speaker: parks
fragments: I am Culture's stage.
Open space becomes gathering space.
Festivals, concerts, markets—I host them all.
Together we create public life.

dialogueFragments.speaker: parks
fragments: I am intentional emptiness.
Not void—possibility.
I offer space without agenda.
The city needs places to simply be.

dialogueFragments.speaker: parks
fragments: What is my purpose if I'm 'unproductive'?
I create no goods, no services.
But I create wellbeing. Is that enough?
Sometimes the most valuable thing is nothing at all.
